parameters.name: Ensembl Regulatory Build: Motifs
parameters.description: The Ensembl Regulatory Build contains a genome-wide set of regions that are likely to be involved in gene regulation. Transcription factor motifs were identified using position weight matrices from JASPAR (http://jaspar.genereg.net) in enriched regions identified by the Ensembl ChIP-seq analysis pipeline.
